```{r}
#update.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(haven)

#load all of the datasets I'm combining
MMPD <- read_stata("MMPD/mmALL_073120_v16.dta")
#View(MMPD)
GWF <- read_stata("GWF Autocratic Regimes 1.2/GWF_AllPoliticalRegimes.dta")
View(GWF)
Svolik <- read_stata("regime data/regime and no authority spells, country-year, 1946-2008.dta")
#View(Svolik)
protest_country_year <- left_join(MMPD, Svolik)
#View(protest_country_year)

initial_merge<-unique(protest_country_year)

edit_GWF <- subset(GWF, select = c(cowcode, year, gwf_country, gwf_regimetype, gwf_party, gwf_military, gwf_monarchy, gwf_personal, gwf_nonautocracy))

#join datasets
Newdat <- left_join(initial_merge, edit_GWF)
#View(Newdat)

#newerdat <- unique(Newdat)

```
